description: Lists the agents belonging to an account and information about each agent.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Enumerating agents can reveal the business functions and AWS principals associated with each agent, helping attackers understand which identities are valuable targets.
Inspecting agent configurations can expose which IAM roles and policies they rely on, informing privilege-escalation plans.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListAgents to inventory AI agents, map their integrations, and select high-impact targets for further compromise.
